text: innum (itaiyum ninaivu kurunkal;) musa tam camukattaritam, "ninkal oru pacumattai arukka ventum enru niccayamaka allah unkalukkuk kattalaiyitukiran" enru connapotu, avarkal; "(musave!) Enkalai parikacattirku alakkukinrira?" Enru kurinar; (appolutu) avar, "(appatip parikacikkum) arivinarkalil oruvanaka nan akivitamal allahvitam patukapput tetukiren" enru kurinar
